name: Escape From The Sun
description:
Dash through levels.
Escape the emerging suns.
Shoot everything in sight.

Escape from the Sun is a speedrun shooter all about avoiding our Suns! as they're very evil!!

Choose from over 30 weapons to shoot anything in sight. Your inventory can only hold 10 items so it will be wise to use the most effective weapons later in the game.

Each level is a chase sequence, where you run away from the emerging 4 suns in the solar system through over 20+ levels. Shooting knocks them back but it only makes them come back stronger.

Prepare to die alot with lots of challenging bosses to fight, each with their own gimmick.
